help_menu:
Acceptable commands
'go': used to move to another location
'get': used to pickup an item
'talk: allows you to interact
'look': allows you to look around a room
'use': allows you to use the items in your inventory
'equip': allows you to equip yourself with the equipment in your inventory
'quit':  allows you to exit the game
'new': allows you to start a new game
'help': brings you to this menu
Acceptable directions to use with 'go':
'north'
'east'
'south'
'west'
